title: RussiaUkraineTranslation
author: RussiaUkraineTranslation
content: Did you guys get your $SPARK token airdrop yet? I got my Songbird from holding XRP and now I am getting another airdrop. On top of that, I also got a Coreum airdrop. I'm sure there are more that I can claim by holding XRP but the process of setting up a trustline is tedious and scary. In addition to the Flare drop, there is also a MAXX Finance airdrop coming. You just need to hold some cryptos in your wallet on their native chains, like ETH on Ethereum and MATIC on Polygon and then enter the freeclaim on their website. I read a lot of people on here think airdrops are scams and not worth the time anymore but the amount of money I got from just holding XRP makes me think otherwise.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: The Airdrop program that is happening these days is really not worth it mate, If you are an old player in crypto, you will feel a significant difference. I'm curious about what you get from holding XRP in your wallet, how much (in dollar) have you earned? If it's just a few dollars, I have to honestly say it's not worth it. The crypto world is different now, not like it used to be, now there are lots of programs to get crypto for free, for example being an ambassador or scout in various projects. I personally have raised tens of thousands of dollars from these programs.
